channel.title: Rapax - The way you want it
channel.description:
[i]I didn't know where to post this, so I dropped it here. I was thinking about posting this on Gamedev.Moparscape.org, but since there's nobody really active there, I dropped it here.[/i]
[b]Introduction[/b] -Rapax is going to be a Modder's group.- It's since a few months that I'm modding games now. I'm actually looking for a small modding team that mods games like: -Mount and Blade: Warband -Rome Total War -maybe Private Servers
Now I'm working on a mod called Rome Total War: Zombie Invasion.
[b]applications[/b] I'm in need of a moddeler and a website developer. If you're interested apply in one of the comments. Just tell me your age, experience, ...
[i]I typed this on my Ipod, sorryfor spelling mistakes. I'll include media of my -first- mod this or next week.[/i]

item.title: Rapax - The way you want it
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

I didn’t know where to post this, so I dropped it here.
I was thinking about posting this on Gamedev.Moparscape.org, but since there’s nobody really active there, I dropped it here.

Introduction
-Rapax is going to be a Modder’s group.-
It’s since a few months that I’m modding games now.
I’m actually looking for a small modding team that mods games like:
-Mount and Blade: Warband
-Rome Total War
-maybe Private Servers

Now I’m working on a mod called Rome Total War: Zombie Invasion.

applications
I’m in need of a moddeler and a website developer.
If you’re interested apply in one of the comments.
Just tell me your age, experience, …

I typed this on my Ipod, sorryfor spelling mistakes.
I’ll include media of my -first- mod this or next week.

Read full topic
item.source: Rapax - The way you want it
